Articles.Content:
I am having problems with my mouse inputs in my parallel windows 7 desktop, inside my mac computer. The thing is I have 3 mice and none is able to rotate the camera on any scene. Sometimes this happens and I unplugg and plugin again on different input entries and it starts working. But now I have been doing this and its not helping any more. What can I do? is this a known problem? Playing on modded and non modded is the same...

Edited July 9, 2017 by Agustin

OK I figured it out and will leave the answer here in case anyone is having the same problem. I solved it by going to the upper right of the screen, and when the mac toolbar appears on the top there is a tab about input mouse device, besides the keyboard tab. There I selected my mouse and forced it to work on windows 7, and VOILA
Question: why not just play the mac version of KSP?
